Only at Baglioni Hotel Regina will you feel the beating pulse of one of the most charming areas of Rome, the historic Via Veneto with its myriad of splendours. Only here will you see the Dolce Vita come back to life.

$65 / Night

4 Guests
Recently refurbished in an individual and elegant style, enjoy the comfort of a luxurious Corrib Room. Upgrade to an immaculate Corrib Lake View
Service: Free Breakfast, Free Wifi, Free Water
Special: Feature beds, Egyptian cotton bed linen, Voya toiletries, Urndown service
